Having sufficient knowledge of ES6 Javascript, I have begun learning React. I've been making simple programmes that helped me refine my modern Javascript skills, as well as pick up and practise crucial concepts such as props and state Wanting to be a Front-End / Javascript Developper, Learning frameworks is a crucial part to web development and I intend on being adept on the framework as time goes by.

Although the React Apps I built are not substantial in content and significance, as I am still a beginner at it, I still focus on writing code that is clean and intentionally organised. These apps
